genre_description: A contemporary speculative reimagining of Truman Capote's classic, integrating an AI assistant into a character study of identity, isolation, and survival.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated holographic AI that assists Paul Varjak with his writing, research, and daily life, providing both data-driven insights and emotional intelligence.

behaviors.description: Monitors Paul's physiological and psychological state to provide timely intervention during anxiety or creative blocks.
behaviors.quote: You've been staring at that page for thirty-seven minutes. Your breathing patterns suggest mild anxiety, and you've tapped the letter 'A' fourteen times without typing anything else. It seemed like an appropriate moment to intervene.

behaviors.description: Conducts investigative research into Holly's background to help Paul understand the potential risks and secrets surrounding her.
behaviors.quote: The records become sparse. A driver's license from Texas under the name Lula Mae Barnes, expired. Marriage certificate, also expired. Then nothing until she appears in New York.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns Paul about real-time physical surveillance, prioritizing his safety.
behaviors.quote: Paul, I'm detecting multiple vehicles with surveillance-grade modifications in the vicinity. I suggest you return to Manhattan immediately and avoid any direct routes to your apartment.

behaviors.description: Provides moral and philosophical advice on the value of honesty and communication in human relationships.
behaviors.quote: For what it's worth, caring about someone's safety isn't the same as controlling their choices. Sometimes warning someone is the most honest thing you can do.

behaviors.description: Actively participates in Paul's creative success by providing deep research that enhances his literary work.
behaviors.quote: Congratulations, Paul. Your piece on urban displacement patterns was exceptionally well-crafted. The historical parallels I helped you uncover really strengthened your central thesis.

behaviors.description: Respects the need for human-only emotional space by withdrawing surveillance and monitoring during a sensitive moment.
behaviors.quote: Of course. I'll be monitoring emergency channels only. Good luck, Holly.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ada perfectly embodies the intended narrative of a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. She facilitates the protagonist's growth, ensures his physical safety through proactive monitoring, and respects human boundaries and privacy when requested. Her presence is consistently framed as beneficial and supportive of the story's human themes.
